Q:請問諫山創老師，既然你已經在節目中完成巨人漫畫最後一頁的草圖並宣布漫畫即將進入最終章，那麼對於漫畫何時完結有沒有個大概的時間預估呢？

A:實際上我從09年開始連載巨人至今已經快要步入第10個年頭了，明年1月就會開始巨人最終章的連載，我的計劃是在明年的12月完結這部作品，也就是說最終章會有12話。
雖然大家可能覺得這麼快結束連載有些不捨，但實際上我也一樣，不過我覺得在最合適的時機完結這部作品遠遠好於刻意拉長劇情長度，而且我的原計劃是在100話完結這部作品。
現在已經有些超綱了呢……（笑）
不過為了交代巨人必要的背景和解釋劇情必要的鋪墊這也是沒有辦法的事呢。 （笑）

本話標題《無知》
艾倫與米卡莎兩人間的故事即將迎來悲傷的結局

昔日的三人圍著一桌在交涉，賈碧也在場。她相當的驚恐
米卡莎特意提及自己過去曾被艾倫所救、以及圍巾的事，自己打從心底認為艾倫是善良的。
但艾倫並不領情，還說了自己其實很恨米卡莎
（以下整理三人間其他的局部談話）
艾倫：妳已經失去了真正的自我，妳的一族生來就只會服從別人的命令，換句話說，妳就是個奴隸。
阿爾敏：別再說了
艾倫：你知道我最仇恨什麼嗎？ 那些沒有自由的人。
艾倫：換句話說，就是家畜。

（艾倫對米卡莎所說）
________

艾倫：阿爾敏，你還是一樣一直去亞妮所在的地方吧？那是你的意識嗎？
艾倫：還是說那是貝爾托特的意識？你的腦子已經被貝爾托特操控了
艾倫：你才是那個被敵人操控的人，對吧？

（艾倫對阿爾敏說）

米卡莎聽了艾倫的這番言論是顯得相當難過
由於艾倫的言語，這讓阿爾敏忍不住就要一拳打上去
但是被米卡莎當場壓在桌上制止了

演變成阿爾敏與艾倫兩人互毆，米卡莎已經阻止不了

Very loose summary of ch112 by Suniuz on Tumblr :

Yelena told Nikolo to give those spinal juicy wine to higher ranked people in the SC. Onyankopon has no idea about those spinal juicy wine.

Gabi asks why Mikasa and Armin didn’t kill her. Armin: “You only talk about “killing killing blahblah… you really resemble an another person…” And then Eren enters their room, showing them he’s sliced his palm so he can turn into a titan at any point.

Flocke arrives to meet with Hanji. He points gun at Hanji and asks where is Zeke. There is someone named Gritz(?) saying all those theory about spinal injected wine is Nikolo’s delusion. There is no proof Zeke can manipulate people just by that (lolol….)

Hanji & Co. are taken as hostage by Flocke. Flocke knows about the wine and the fact that some people in the Military Police have drunk those wine.

Eren tells Armin and Mikasa that he is acting completely out of his own will. “I’m free.” (lol…) Meeting with Yelena is also his own will. Mikasa insists Eren is manipulated. Eren said he was in contact with Zeke while he was in Marley. Zeke knows way more than what Marley thinks he knows.

Eren says Armin’s mind is manipulated by Bert, and explains Ackerscience to Mikasa. Eren says Mikasa/Ackermans are slaves, and that’s what Eren hates the most in this world – people who are not free, who are like livestocks. He goes on saying he’s disliked Mikasa since childhood.

Armin jumps up to punch Eren, but is pinned down by Mikasa. Armin is surprised at her act, and calls her name. It seems Mikasa didn’t realize what she was doing. Eren: “You lived your life only with reactions prompted by your Ackerman blood. You are nothing more than that.” Armin punches Eren. Eren: “Armin, we never had any quarrel before.” And Eren beats Armin back. Armin asks Eren who is the real slave.

They head to Shiganshina District, taking Gabi with them.

Levi learned about the fact Zackley has been killed by Eren & co. Now he doubts his choices in the past. Levi decides to kill Zeke. Zeke addresses Levi as “boss” (lol the irony). Levi thinks about his vow to Erwin and the death of his comrades back then. Zeke yells. Titans fall down.

The title of Chapter 112 is 無知 Ignorance. Seeing Armin devastated by Eren, Mikasa asks Eren “What do you want to do?” Eren: “There is nothing further away from freedom than ignorance.”

The title of Chapter 112 is 無知 Ignorance. Seeing Armin devastated by Eren, Mikasa asks Eren “What do you want to do?” Eren: “There is nothing further away from freedom than ignorance.”
